2019950.name: Wheels of Duty
2019950.description:
After a terrorist-engineered virus crippled the world, humanity adapted the only way it could — on wheels. Now, survivors roll into battle in high-powered wheelchairs, armed to the teeth and ready to reclaim what’s left.

Customize your rig, perfect your aim in the gun range, and prepare for fast-paced, tactical wheelchair warfare against players and bots across diverse maps and intense game modes.

Game Modes:

  • Team Deathmatch – Roll out with your squad and dominate the opposition.

  • Free For All – Everyone’s your enemy. Be the last one rolling.

  • Gun Game – Earn new weapons with every kill — no breaks, no mercy.

  • Last Man Standing – One life. One shot at glory.

  • Last Team Standing – Team up, no respawns. Win or get wiped out.

Join our community, share your feedback, and help shape the future of Wheels of Duty
2019950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
